{"node-1744298165966":{"ApplyMapping":{"Inputs":["node-1744298077240"],"Mapping":[{"Dropped":true,"FromPath":["TransactionID"],"FromType":"string","ToKey":"TransactionID","ToType":"string"},{"Dropped":true,"FromPath":["CustomerID"],"FromType":"string","ToKey":"CustomerID","ToType":"string"},{"Dropped":true,"FromPath":["CustomerDOB"],"FromType":"timestamp","ToKey":"CustomerDOB","ToType":"timestamp"},{"Dropped":true,"FromPath":["CustGender"],"FromType":"string","ToKey":"CustGender","ToType":"string"},{"Dropped":true,"FromPath":["CustLocation"],"FromType":"string","ToKey":"CustLocation","ToType":"string"},{"Dropped":true,"FromPath":["CustAccountBalance"],"FromType":"string","ToKey":"CustAccountBalance","ToType":"string"},{"Dropped":false,"FromPath":["TransactionDate"],"FromType":"timestamp","ToKey":"TransactionDate","ToType":"timestamp"},{"Dropped":false,"FromPath":["TransactionTime"],"FromType":"string","ToKey":"TransactionTime","ToType":"string"},{"Dropped":true,"FromPath":["TransactionAmount (INR)"],"FromType":"string","ToKey":"TransactionAmount (INR)","ToType":"string"},{"Dropped":false,"FromPath":["Age"],"FromType":"bigint","ToKey":"Age","ToType":"long"}],"Name":"Time Dimention"}},"node-1744123229330":{"CustomCode":{"ClassName":"CleaningTransform","Code":"import pandas as pd
from awsglue.dynamicframe import DynamicFrame, DynamicFrameCollection
from pyspark.sql.functions import year
from pyspark.sql.utils import AnalysisException

# Extract first DynamicFrame
dyf = dfc.select(list(dfc.keys())[0])

# Convert to Spark DataFrame
df_spark = dyf.toDF()

# Convert to Pandas (âš ï¸ only for small datasets)
df_pd = df_spark.toPandas()

# âž• Parse dates using pandas
df_pd['CustomerDOB'] = pd.to_datetime(df_pd['CustomerDOB'], dayfirst=True, errors='coerce')
df_pd['TransactionDate'] = pd.to_datetime(df_pd['TransactionDate'], dayfirst=True, errors='coerce')

# Drop rows where dates are missing
df_pd.dropna(subset=['CustomerDOB', 'TransactionDate'], inplace=True)

# â³ Remove time part (safely)
df_pd['CustomerDOB'] = df_pd['CustomerDOB'].apply(lambda x: x.date() if pd.notnull(x) else x)
df_pd['TransactionDate'] = df_pd['TransactionDate'].apply(lambda x: x.date() if pd.notnull(x) else x)

# Convert back to datetime so we can calculate age
df_pd['CustomerDOB'] = pd.to_datetime(df_pd['CustomerDOB'])
df_pd['TransactionDate'] = pd.to_datetime(df_pd['TransactionDate'])

# Fix DOBs with 2000+ error
df_pd['CustomerDOB'] = df_pd.apply(
    lambda row: row['CustomerDOB'] - pd.DateOffset(years=100) if row['CustomerDOB'] > row['TransactionDate'] else row['CustomerDOB'],
    axis=1
)

# Calculate age
df_pd['Age'] = df_pd['TransactionDate'].dt.year - df_pd['CustomerDOB'].dt.year

# Filter age between 18 and 100
df_pd = df_pd[(df_pd['Age'] >= 18) & (df_pd['Age'] <= 100)]

# Drop duplicates and nulls
df_pd.drop_duplicates(inplace=True)
df_pd.dropna(inplace=True)

# Convert back to Spark DataFrame
if df_pd.empty:
    df_result = glueContext.spark_session.createDataFrame([], df_spark.schema)
else:
    df_result = glueContext.spark_session.createDataFrame(df_pd)

# Convert to DynamicFrame
dyf_cleaned = DynamicFrame.fromDF(df_result, glueContext, "dyf_cleaned")

return DynamicFrameCollection({"cleaned_data": dyf_cleaned}, glueContext)

from awsglue.dynamicframe import DynamicFrame, DynamicFrameCollection
from pyspark.sql.functions import col, year, month, quarter, date_format
from pyspark.sql.types import IntegerType
from pyspark.sql.utils import AnalysisException

# âœ… Extract the actual DynamicFrame directly
if isinstance(dfc, DynamicFrameCollection):
    keys = list(dfc.keys())
    print(f"[DimensionTransform] Keys: {keys}")
    if not keys:
        raise ValueError("DynamicFrameCollection is empty.")
    dyf = dfc.select(keys[0])["cleaned_data"]  # ðŸ”¥ fix is here
elif isinstance(dfc, DynamicFrame):
    dyf = dfc
else:
    raise TypeError("Expected DynamicFrame or DynamicFrameCollection, got: {}".format(type(dfc)))

# âœ… Convert to Spark DataFrame
df = dyf.toDF()
return DynamicFrameCollection({
    "DimCustomer": DynamicFrame.fromDF(df, glueContext)
}, glueContext)
